features: METAL CLIPS KEEP SHEETS FIRMLY IN PLACE: featuring extra thick, flexible, and stretchy elasticized straps, these sheet straps are designed to firmly keep your sheets in place; can stretch up to 25 inches; plus, extra durable metal clips strongly grip your sheets and provide a firm hold to help keep your bedsheet from sliding off your mattress

UNIQUE DESIGN FOR MAXIMUM STRENGTH: unlike other sheet straps, which feature an inner clip in the shape of a triangle, these are in the shape of a circle, making them more durable, strong and resistant to snapping or breaking; innately durable design to last for years

ADJUSTABLE FOR ALL BEDDING TYPES: strap length measure 6 inches and can be stretched up to 25 inches long; adjustable straps so you can reach the desired tension; works well on all bedding types, from California King to Twin
NO MATTRESS FLIPPING REQUIRED: unlike many others, installation is in just 4 easy steps; easy to change sheets often and does not require any mattress flipping
WRINKLE-FREE SHEETS: hotel style luxury in your own bedroom; enjoy a beautifully made bed everyday; sheet straps help ensure no wrinkles in your bottom bed sheet for added comfort

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work really well for bed sheets
reviews.reviewText: These are great, they are fully adjustable, they feel heavy duty and hopefully will not lose their elasticity to quickly. My only initial problem was trying to open the clips other wise these are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our fitted sheet kept coming off the mattress. These are easy to snap on the sheet and help keep it in place. I actually leave them on the sheet during g the wash and dry cycle and they don’t come off. I recommend these to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Holds on to the fitted sheet really well, but doesn't necessarily fix the problem.
reviews.reviewText: These guys do a great job of holding on to the fitted sheet. That is, they snap on like some suspenders from the '80s and they stay connected to the fitted sheet where you snapped them on. In my case, they didn't really do a lot to stop the fitted sheet from twisting. If you think about it like your mattress is a cylinder and the fitted sheet is 3/4 of a tube that can spin around the cylinder, these things basically make it like a complete tube. It still can spin around, there's just more of it. I know that's a really weird way of explaining it but.. if there was some sort of gripping it grippy material where the parts come together it would probably function a bit better than it does.Otherwise, they seem very well built and strong and the clips are really good at what they do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does it's job so well!
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I have satin sheets. Those sheets were so frustrating for us, they are so comfortable, but we would have to put a corner or two back on the bed every single day! We decided to get these to try out, and they work amazingly! We haven't had to adjust, or fix , our sheets since! Super easy to use, even by yourself, and damn do they work!We are toss and turn all night, now we don't have to worry about fixing the sheets come morning. If you have a problem with sheets that won't stay on the bed, get these clips!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Between me and my dog, we are always rolling around enough to pull the fitted sheet up so this was a big help! After installing them my fitted sheet has stayed in place perfectly. Sure, they were a little difficult to put on but that's because you want them on there securely so you'll have a bit of struggle getting them over the corners but that's to be expected. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little bulky
reviews.reviewText: They do what it says it's supposed to do, no doubt. They are very durable. They are not easy to use. Once they are in place, they remain very bulky. I actually had a set of sheets that had the elastic very thick and they did not hold very well with these sheets. Had to use my old school ones that I already had .Unfortunately, that was the main reason I bought them. However, I did keep them because I used it for my mattress protector and it holds semi well. They don't stay in place but the Protector doesn't come out of place. I still have to adjust it and pull them in place every time I change the sheets. Buy it at your own discretion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter suggested these, as every night, my sheet corners would come loose. She put them on for me and ever since, the corners stay put! Thank you 🙏

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Impressed. Sheets stay on!
reviews.reviewText: I have numerous sheets from over the years, hand me downs from mom and some have shallow contour pockets. Without barely lifting the mattress these clip on in three outer places and slide over the corner. The clip is a bit difficult to open but thats good because you don't want it pulling off the sheet. Very pleased.
Having just purchased a new mattress, was getting frustrated with having to adjust both the mattress protector and fitted sheet everyday. Now, only time its a challenge is changing the sheets.
